enWisdom: Patience is a victory; haste [and impatience] is a danger
Patience is the guarantor of success
Patience is the symbol of [divine] succour

Wisdom: الصَّبْرُ عَلَى مَضَضِ الْغُصَصِ يُوجِبُ الظَّفَرَ بِالْفُرَصِ
enWisdom: Patience in the face of agonizing distress leads to success in attaining opportunities
Be patient [and] you will triumph
Be patient [and] you will achieve
Through patience, the loftiness of matters is attained

Wisdom: بَشِّرْ نَفْسَكَ إِذَا صَبَرْتَ بِالنُّجْحِ [بِالنَّجَاحِ‏] وَالظَّفَرِ
enWisdom: Give glad tidings of success and victory to yourself when you are patient
Good patience is the vanguard of victory
Persevering patience is the symbol of success and victory
In patience there is triumph
It is seldom that one is patient yet he does not gain victory

Wisdom: لَنْ يَعْدَمَ النَّصْرَ مَنِ اسْتَنْجَدَ الصَّبْرَ
enWisdom: One who seeks relief from patience will never be deprived of succor

Wisdom: لَمْ يَعْدَمِ النَّصْرَ مَنِ انْتَصَرَ بِالصَّبْرِ
enWisdom: One who seeks assistance through patience will not be deprived of victory
One who is patient is victorious

Wisdom: مَنْ صَبَرَ فَنَفْسَهُ وَقَّرَ وَبِالثَّوَابِ ظَفِرَ وَلِلَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ أَطَاعَ
enWisdom: One who is patient honours himself, attains success with reward and obeys Allah, the Glorified
One who sets foot upon the vessel of patience gains victory?
The bitterness of patience bears the [sweet] fruit of victory
The bitterness of patience is removed by the sweetness of victory
The key to victory is remaining patient

Wisdom: لَا ظَفَرَ لِمَنْ لَا صَبْرَ لَهُ
enWisdom: There is no victory for the one who has no patience

Wisdom: لَا يَعْدَمُ الصَّبُورُ الظَّفَرَ وَإِنْ طَالَ بِهِ الزَّمَانُ
enWisdom: The patient one is never deprived of victory, even if it takes a long time [to come]

Wisdom: يَئُولُ أَمْرُ الصَّبُورِ إِلَى دَرَكِ غَايَتِهِ وَبُلُوغِ أَمَلِهِ
enWisdom: The affair of the patient one returns to the realization of his goal and reaching his aspiration
